attributes.action: Cameron's pledge to give aid for next 20 years!!
attributes.additional_details:
We do not want this pledge to be "pushed" forward!
We cannot afford to give monies now. The people in this country are suffering enough, without this government giving away "our" money. Ask him to hold a referendum on this issue, I don't think he will like the response! how dare he "push through" without our consent! Tell this government and the politicians we, the tax payers of this country object most strongly!
